title: PM expresses grief over death of Justice (retd) Malik Qayyum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 17 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday expressed grief over the death of Justice (retired) Malik Muhammad Qayyum.
The prime minister extended condolences to the family of Justice (retd) Qayyum and said the deceased had a distinguished position in the field of law.
He prayed for the departed soul to rest in peace and for the grant of patience to the bereaved family.
